import { useState} from 'react' import MovieCard from './movie-comp/MovieCard' import Slider from 'react-slick' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' function MovieFilterList() { const [findmovies, setMoviesBy] = useState([]) function FindMovie(selectedGenre) { fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=9122d3e99f5cf10f65b111a1dcd51b20&with_genres=' + selectedGenre + '&primary_release_year=&language=ru-RU&page=1') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMoviesBy(data.results) }) } let settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 1, // centerMode: true } return ( <>
{/* */}
{ findmovies.map(item => ( )) } ) } export default MovieFilterList;
